CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 3, 1945, pg. 9, reads: "Gay Sorority Party - Mu Chapter of Delta Sigma Theta Sorority were hostesses at a Halloween Velada (Spanish party), at the Centre Avenue Branch YWCA, Saturday, in honor of their fellow students. Left to right: Bertha Glenn, Anna Brooks, Mary Richardson, Maralyn Duncan, Lois Buchanan, Doris Handy, Martina Richardson and Eva Hannon.  Miss Lula J. Howard, also an aide, is not pictured. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Delta Sigma Theta, Mu Chapter sorority members, from left: Bertha Glenn, Anna Brooks, Mary Richardson, Maralyn Duncan, Lois Buchanan, Doris Handy, Martina Richardson, and Eva Hannon, posed in Centre Avenue YWCA
